metadata.title: CVE-2019-25051 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
objstack in GNU Aspell 0.60.8 has a heap-based buffer overflow inacommon::ObjStack::dup_top (called from acommon::StringMap::add andacommon::Config::lookup_list).

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-25051` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

aspell - 0.60.7~20110707-3ubuntu0.1+esm1
libaspell15 - 0.60.7~20110707-3ubuntu0.1+esm1
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: aspell package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '0.60.7~20110707-3ubuntu0.1+esm1').
